title: Azir broken
body: When I auto attack with my sand soldiers most of the time azir tries to walk to a random spot on the map.  Not sure why but I cant keep consistant positioning against my opponents as I almost immediately begin to walk to top

replies.body:
Looks like this may have been resolved with the latest (small) update - it's not longer listed on the server status page. Lemme verify.

**EDIT:** Looks like this one is going to be next patch.
ya cause its still happening, maybe stuff like this should be listed on the status page still so we know of known bugs that affect gameplay

I'm also having this bug. When ever sand soldiers are issued an attack order, they will do one attack, then azir begins to move towards a random point to the right and bottom of his current location. It happens most of the time and the only way to counter it is to hold the right mouse button down and leave the cursor on the target. This sometimes results  azir moving when the unit is killed and keeps the player from putting his cursor anywhere else. It's a major disadvantage and makes Azir feel broken as hell.
